db:abstract.db:para: PickEvent holds information when an object is picked. This is received as a parameter in most of the QObjectPicker component signals when picking succeeds.

db:section.db:title: accepted : bool
db:section.db:para: Specifies if event has been accepted

db:section.db:title: [read-only] button : int
db:section.db:para: Specifies mouse button that caused the event

db:section.db:title: [read-only] buttons : int
db:section.db:para: Specifies state of the mouse buttons for the event

db:section.db:title: [read-only] distance : real
db:section.db:para: Specifies the distance of the hit to the camera

db:section.db:title: [read-only] entity : Entity
db:section.db:para: The entity that the picked geometry belongs to.
If the object picker is not attached to a leaf node in the scene graph, this is useful to find which child entity was actually picked.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] localIntersection : Vector3D
db:section.db:para: Specifies the coordinates of the hit in the local coordinate system of the picked entity

db:section.db:title: [read-only] modifiers : int
db:section.db:para: Specifies state of the mouse buttons for the event

db:section.db:title: [read-only] position : Point2D
db:section.db:para: Specifies the mouse position with respect to the render area (window or quick item)

db:section.db:title: [read-only] viewport : Viewport
db:section.db:para: The viewport in which this event originated. A null value means the event originated from a frame graph branch without a Viewport. If a frame graph branch has a Viewport inside a Viewport the property will contain the leaf viewport.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] worldIntersection : Vector3D
db:section.db:para: Specifies the coordinates of the hit in world coordinate system
